About University Club of Winter Park University Club of Winter Park University Club of Winter Park 841 N Park Ave Winter Park , Florida 32789 (407) 644-6149 debbie@uclubwp.org Owner: Home Weddings Parties Meetings The University Club of Winter Park About Us Contact Us Home » About Us About The University Club of Winter Park Established in 1934 as a forum where educators and professionals could meet and exchange ideas, the University of Winter Park now stands as a beautiful club & venue where ideas and experiences can be shared in equal measure. From intimate weddings to extravagant parties and corporate meetings, we bring your ideas to life. Home About Us Testimonials Contact Us Privacy Policy Site Map University Club of Winter Park 841 N Park Ave Winter Park , FL 32789 Phone : (407) 644-6149 Log in Login Email Password Forgot Password? Meet Our Dedicated Team | The Woodlands Country Club, TX × Thank you for visiting our site. Please review our Privacy Policy . We use cookies on our site and collect other information pursuant to our Privacy Policy. By continuing to use our site, you consent to our Privacy Policy and data collection practices. Moved to Houston in October 80Graduated Culinary Institute of America. Worked at Cellar in Sky World Trade Center, Sheraton Corporation, Junior League of Houston, Bon Appetite, Lakeside Country Club and Bay Oaks Country Club.Over Thirty years in Food Service13years as a Invited Employee.Team member Texas Chefs Association George W Bush Presidential inauguration reception, Economic Summit Rice University.Culinary Institute of America – Culinary Team Member25 years as a member Houston Livestock Show & Rodeo, Chairman 2 timeWife Tracy, son Gregory, Daughter ElizabethStarted at the Woodlands CC in February Contact Me Jesse Regalado Club Manager | Tournament Contact Me Jesse.Regalado Contact Me + Close Jesse Regalado information modal Jesse Regalado Club Manager | Tournament Serving since 2022 Jesse.Regalado Jesse.Regalado Contact Me Contact Me Amber Sickafoose Membership Director Contact Me 281-845-4886 Amber.Sickafoose Contact Me About Amber + Close Amber Sickafoose information modal Amber Sickafoose Membership Director Serving since 2010 281-845-4886 Amber.Sickafoose 281-845-4886 Amber.Sickafoose Contact Me About Amber Amber holds a BS degree in Marketing from Bellevue University. She started her career as a Director of Marketing for a financial company but quickly decided that sales was her real passion. Her golf career began in 2009 for The Woodlands Country Club as a membership director for both The Oaks and Panther Trail courses as well as The Woodlands Country Club courses. She is a very active member in the community and a graduate of Leadership Montgomery County class of 2013. Contact Me Jason Lippy Membership Director Contact Me 832-810-5876 Jason.Lippy Contact Me About Jason + Close Jason Lippy information modal Jason Lippy Membership Director Serving since 2015 832-810-5876 Jason.Lippy 832-810-5876 Jason.Lippy Contact Me About Jason Jason comes to Indian Wells Country Club by way of Desert Falls Country Club in Palm Desert, where he spent the four years as General Manager / Membership Director. Before moving to California in 2015, Jason spent the previous 12 years working as General Manager / Membership Director for Glen Oaks Country Club, a Invited Affiliate Club in Louisville, Kentucky. 

Jason has worked in the golf business his entire career, starting in the Golf Shop at The Polo Fields Country Club when he was only 16.  He then moved to Glenmary Country Club to join the Membership Sales Department. Eventually becoming Club Manager at Glenmary Country Club.  Jason is a graduate of Western Kentucky University’s Broadcasting Department and has also worked covering college basketball and football for ESPN.  Jason’s interests include playing golf, spending time with his wife and eight year old daughter exploring the Coachella Valley. Contact Me Mitchell Putnam Membership Director Contact Me 832-810-5872 Mitchell.Putnam Contact Me About Mitchell + Close Mitchell Putnam information modal Mitchell Putnam Membership Director Serving since 2014 832-810-5872 Mitchell.Putnam 832-810-5872 Mitchell.Putnam Contact Me About Mitchell Email:  Mitchell.Putnam@clubcorp.comMitchell holds a BS degree in Criminal Justice from Sam Houston State University. He was born and raised in Houston Texas. He joined the Invited family as Service Captain at Willow Creek Golf Club in 2014, eventually becoming the Membership Director in 2017. He joined The Golf Trails of The Woodlands team in 2018 as the Membership Director. He enjoys playing golf, fishing, and watching Houston sports teams play. Contact Me Annemarie McKay Event Sales Director Contact Me 281-801-4103 Annemarie.Mckay Contact Me About Annemarie + Close Annemarie McKay information modal Annemarie McKay Event Sales Director Serving since 2015 281-801-4103 Annemarie.McKay 281-801-4103 Annemarie.McKay Contact Me About Annemarie Annemarie is originally from Allen, Tx. She holds a Bachelor’s degree in Hospitality Administration from Stephen F. Austin State University, located in the small town of Nacogdoches, Texas. Annemarie started her career with Invited as a college intern at Stonebriar Country Club in Frisco, Tx. After she graduated, she was hired on fulltime as their Private Event Coordinator assisting with corporate and social events. Annemarie then moved forward in here career and stepped into the role of Private Event Manager at the Las Colinas Country Club in Irving, Tx. There she continued to build her range of events and added Golf Tournaments to her portfolio. She had the privilege of working on events such as George W. Bush Presidential Center’s Warrior Open and the 2015 Volunteers of America North Texas LPGA Shootout. Annemarie recently moved to Houston to further pursue her passion for private events and is proud to call the Woodlands Country Club home, as their Private Event Director. Contact Me Brooke Tyler Event Sales Director Contact Me 281-339-8085 Brooke.Tyler Contact Me About Brooke + Close Brooke Tyler information modal Brooke Tyler Event Sales Director Serving since 2009 281-339-8085 Brooke.Tyler 281-339-8085 Brooke.Tyler Contact Me About Brooke Brooke Tyler is a graduate of The University of Texas at Arlington with a degree in Public Relations. She moved to the Houston Area in 2004 where she started her career in the hospitality industry. She worked for Marriott International for five years as an Event Manager planning various events ranging from corporate, social, to weddings. She began her career at The Woodlands Country Club in 2009 as an Event Manager where she planned Member Events, Member Association Events and Golf Tournaments. In 2012, she took over the Private Event Manager role where she focused on selling and executing all private events for The Woodlands Country Club. She has had the pleasure of working with many members, clients and brides to successfully implement their event. Some of her most favorite memories have been made at The Country Club. She has made some of her closest friendships while working here, as well as meeting her husband, Wes. Contact Us - Moors Valley Country Park & Forest Skip to main content Skip to footer Things To Do Play Stick Man Trail Adventure Valley Mini Golf Adventure Valley Land Rovers Cycle Hire Go Ape High Ropes Go Ape Nets Adventure Go Ape Forest Segways Moors Valley Railway Ranger Den Health & Fitness Walking, Running & Cycling Golf Course 18 Holes Fishing Laser Tag Events Inside Out Dorset 2025 Bunker Open Day Halloween Halloween Experience Santa Specials Plan Your Visit Opening Times Parking Charges Season Tickets Gift Shop Food and Drink Accessibility Maps Schools and Groups Celebrations FAQ Dogs and Horses Wildlife About Us About the Rangers History of Moors Valley Contact Us World War II Bunker Contact Us Moors Valley is located on the Dorset / Hampshire border – two counties that offer fantastic countryside and visitor attractions to enjoy, including the historic New Forest and the award-winning beaches at Christchurch and the Jurassic Coast World Heritage Site. If you’re visiting the area for the first time, we recommend you take a look at the Visit Dorset and The New Forest websites for more information about the area and visitor attractions nearby. If you’re contacting us about raffle prizes please follow our step by step guide on our dedicated raffle prize requests page. Email : rangers@moors-valley.co.uk Visitor Centre: 01425 470721 The Barn Café: 01425 477665 – info@idhospitalityltd.co.uk Moors Valley Railway: 01425 471415 Go Ape information: 01603 895500 Golf and Activity Centre: 01425 479776 (For questions about another activity eg. Laser Tag, please go to the activity page. ) Address: Moors Valley Country Park, Horton Road, Ashley Heath, Dorset, BH24 2ET Explore More About us Raffle Prize Requests Volunteering Working at Moors Valley Wildlife Subscribe to receive latest news and updates Signup form First Name Last Name Email Submit Things To Do Events Find Us Data Protection and Small Print Our Terms and Conditions Cookie Policy Follow us on Facebook Follow us on Instagram Follow us on X (twitter) Copyright © 2025 • Dorset Council | All Rights Reserved. Moors Valley is a joint venture between Dorset Council and Forestry England. Manage Consent To provide the best experiences, we use technologies like cookies to store and/or access device information. Consenting to these technologies will allow us to process data such as browsing behaviour or unique IDs on this site. Not consenting or withdrawing consent, may adversely affect certain features and functions. Functional Functional Always active The technical storage or access is strictly necessary for the legitimate purpose of enabling the use of a specific service explicitly requested by the subscriber or user, or for the sole purpose of carrying out the transmission of a communication over an electronic communications network. Preferences Preferences The technical storage or access is necessary for the legitimate purpose of storing preferences that are not requested by the subscriber or user. Statistics Statistics The technical storage or access that is used exclusively for statistical purposes. The technical storage or access that is used exclusively for anonymous statistical purposes. Without a subpoena, voluntary compliance on the part of your Internet Service Provider, or additional records from a third party, information stored or retrieved for this purpose alone cannot usually be used to identify you. Marketing Marketing The technical storage or access is required to create user profiles to send advertising, or to track the user on a website or across several websites for similar marketing purposes. Board of Directors - Winter Park Chamber of Commerce Skip to content Join Now Member Login Upcoming Events Facebook Instagram LinkedIn YouTube About Us About Us Board of Directors Staff Trustees Blog Membership Join Now Member Directory Membership Benefits Member Onboarding Marketing Opportunities Events & Programs Signature Events Signature Series Leadership Winter Park Relaunch Youth Leaders Resources Winter Park  Prosperity Scorecard Meeting Room Rentals Job Board Member Discounts Leadership Development Visit Welcome Center Park Avenue Member Directory Relocation Guide Interactive Map 2025 Board of Directors Executive Committee Laura Walda Chair Lowndes Laura Walda is a shareholder specializing in commercial real estate law, with a focus on contract and lease negotiations, real estate transactions, credit facility structuring, and title insurance review. She also has experience in commercial litigation, particularly in title insurance, landlord/tenant disputes, and banking matters. Dr. Keith Whittingham Chair-Elect Rollins College / Artifx Coffee Carroll Goggin Past-Chair DBG Promotions Carroll Hanley Goggin is the co-owner and CFO of DBG Promotions and a dedicated community and industry leader, serving on national advocacy committees and holding multiple leadership roles at Rollins College. She was appointed to the Florida Council on Arts and Culture in 2020 and has received several awards recognizing her volunteer service. Joel Knopp Treasurer Forvis Mazars LLP Steve Kramer Executive The Mayflower at Winter Park Steve Kramer is President and CEO of The Mayflower at Winter Park, where he has led the organization through its largest expansion since 1989. With a 30-year career spanning healthcare and hospitality leadership, Steve brings a unique blend of operational expertise and civic engagement, including roles with the Winter Park Rotary Club, Leadership Winter Park, and LeadingAge Florida. Arnaldo Oliveras Executive 180 Commercial Real Estate Advisors Arnaldo Oliveras is the CEO of 180 Commercial Real Estate Advisors, a licensed broker and instructor operating in Florida and Puerto Rico, with extensive experience in international commercial real estate and a passion for community service. He actively serves on several boards, including the Hispanic Chamber of Commerce of Metro Orlando and the Rollins Museum of Art, while also championing causes like The Leukemia and Lymphoma Society and supporting the arts and nonprofit fundraising efforts. Emily Williams Executive Be on Park , Clementine , The Grove , and Z Properties Emily Dowling Williams is a Winter Park-based entrepreneur known for her vibrant, design-forward businesses, including Be On Park, Z Properties, The Grove, and Clementine. With a strong background in retail and a passion for curated luxury, she brings color, joy, and high design to Central Florida while actively engaging in the local community. Representatives Mike Carolan Legacy Rep WHWW Michael P. Carolan is a shareholder and chair of the real estate department at Winderweedle, Haines, Ward and Woodman, P.A., Board Certified in Real Estate Law by The Florida Bar. He represents clients in commercial finance, real estate transactions, and business matters, bringing prior experience as a financial analyst and serving in leadership roles with the Winter Park Chamber of Commerce. Dawn Braddy Leadership Winter Park Rep Orange County Clerk of Courts Dawn Braddy is the Operations Assistant Director for the Orange County Clerk of the Court, with over 36 years of service and a strong background in leadership and public administration. A dedicated community volunteer and graduate of Leadership Winter Park, she has earned multiple awards for her service and continues to play an active role in local initiatives through the Winter Park Chamber and other organizations. Board of Directors Ryan DeVos Orlando Magic Ryan DeVos is the Vice President of Shareholder Engagement for the Orlando Magic, leading ownership engagement and long-term family involvement with the team. With a background in NBA global marketing and managing the Magicâs NBA 2K League team, he is also active in community service through various nonprofit boards and initiatives. Diane DiFebbo Full Sail University Diane serves as the Vice President of Accounting and Finance for Full Sail University. Prior to joining Full Sail University in June 2017, Diane served as a principal in the Orlando office of CliftonLarsonAllen, LLP. Diane has over 27 years of experience in financial accounting and reporting, business advisory services, and business operations. Ed Kania Rollins College Ed Kania is Vice President of Business & Finance and Treasurer at Rollins College, bringing extensive financial leadership experience from previous roles at Davidson College and in auditing. He is an active community leader and mentor, serving on multiple boards and recognized for his service by NACUBO. Aimee Hitchner Maynard Nexsen Aimee is an attorney at Maynard Nexsen specializing in trusts, estates, business planning, and family business services, with a strong entrepreneurial background. She helps clients protect their business assets and family legacy through comprehensive legal planning, including succession, asset protection, and various commercial agreements. Patrick Lewis PrivÃ© Salon and Spa Patrick is a Texas Christian University graduate who transitioned from a career in mortgage banking to co-owning and managing Prive Salon and Spa in Winter Park. An active community leader and Leadership Winter Park alumnus, he is passionate about supporting local businesses and balancing family life with his roles in various community committees. Ivan Lys-Dobradin The Gulf Stream Law Firm Ivan Lys-Dobradin is the founder of The Gulf Stream Law Firm PLLC, specializing in residential and commercial property damage insurance disputes in Central Florida. A longtime Winter Park resident, he is actively involved in the community as president of the Winter Park History Museum, a Winter Park Chamber committee member, and an assistant coach at the Orlando Rowing Club. Markys Mackey Verity Construction Kelly Nierstedt Orlando Health Kelly Nierstedt is president of Orlando Health Orlando Regional Medical Center and senior vice president of Orlando Health, leading one of the nationâs largest hospitals with a focus on expanding care access and clinical excellence. With a nursing background and a passion for womenâs health, she is recognized for her leadership in healthcare innovation and advocacy for diversity and equity. Paul Twyford The Winter Park Distilling Company Paul Twyford is a serial entrepreneur and co-founder of The Winter Park Distilling Company, who also owns Hidden Potential, a clinic for children with Autism, and runs the Bonfire clubhouse at Winter Pines Golf Club. A dedicated community leader and Rollins College alumnus, Paul has served in multiple local leadership roles and received recognition as Winter Park Chamber Volunteer of the Year. Alex Uncein First Citizens Bank Alex Uncein is Vice President and Financial Sales Manager at First Citizens Bank, leading business development in the Greater Orlando area with a focus on strategic partnerships and financial solutions. Originally from Venezuela, he brings extensive leadership experience from both banking and industry, actively mentors in the community, and serves as a trustee for the Winter Park Chamber of Commerce. You know your business is capable of more. We can help.
